property.name: Rules
property.value: Pay 1 and name a class to complete this quest. Reward: Reveal the top four cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally of that class into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Heroes and allies you control have Long-Range this turn

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Hunter] Pets you control have +2 / +2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argent Crusade Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) 1, Discard a Unique card --> Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) Pay 8 or discard an ability, ally, and equipment to complete this quest. Reward: Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero. Ongoing: As this ability enters play, choose "ability," "ally," or "equipment." Attached hero's controller can't play more than one card of the chosen kind per turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exhaust all resources you control. Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argent Crusade Reputation Flip Lilliandra, remove a druid in your graveyard from the game --> When Lilliandra is dealt combat damage this turn, she deals 1 nature damage to the source of that damage.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero deals two frost damage to each opposing ally. Allies dealt damage this way have -2 ATK this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Argent Crusade Reputation Flip Paletress, remove a priest in your graveyard from the game --> The next time target hero or ally would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scourge Hero Required Name a Scourge ally. For each ally you control with that name, you may pay 2 to complete this quest. Reward: Draw a card for each 2 paid this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your hero has Assault X, where X is this ally's ATK.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip Askalti, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game --> Target ally has +1 / -1 this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with this weapon, your hero has Long-Range this combat. When your hero deals combat damage with this weapon to a hero, your hero deals that much frost damage to target ally in that hero's party.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) When this ally enters play, you may search your deck for a card and put it into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Nerubian Reputation (You can't put cards with other reputations in your deck.) At the start of your turn, discard a card.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: When each Shaman you control exhausts for the first time each turn, you may ready it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put up to three Pets with different names from your graveyard into your hand.

property.value: Death Knight, Paladin, Warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost to target hero or ally you control.

property.value: Death Knight, Hunter, Paladin

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you strike with this weapon on an opponent's turn, your hero may deal 1 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero. Ongoing: Attached hero has Assault 3 and Mend 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flip Vorath, remove a Scourge ally in your graveyard from the game --> Vorath deals 1 shadow damage to target ally for each ally in its controller's graveyard.

property.value: Death Knight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attach to target hero. Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero. If an ally in attached hero's party would be dealt damage it is dealt that much +1 instead.

property.value: Druid, Rogue

property.value: Your hero deals X melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally, where X is the cost of a non-hero Druid or Rogue you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.) Choose X from among "ability," "ally," "equipment," "location," and "quest." Target player reveals his hand and discards a card of each of the chosen kinds.

property.name: Class Restriction
property.value: Druid, Mage, Priest, Shaman, Warlock

property.value: As this weapon enters play, name two damage types. If the first type of damage would be dealt, that much +1 is dealt instead. If the second type of damage would be dealt, that much -1 is dealt instead.
